short.ar: استخدم أداة الأتمتة في واتساب للتواصل مع عملائك عن طريق إرسال رسائل جماعية.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Use WhatsApp Automation Tool to connect with your customers by sending bulk messages.
short.es: Utilice la herramienta de automatización de WhatsApp para conectar con sus clientes mediante el envío de mensajes masivos.
short.id: Gunakan Alat Otomatisasi WhatsApp untuk terhubung dengan pelanggan Anda dengan mengirim pesan massal.
short.pt_BR: Use a ferramenta de automação do WhatsApp para se conectar com seus clientes enviando mensagens em massa.
short.pt_PT: Utilize a ferramenta de automatização do WhatsApp para se ligar aos seus clientes através do envio de mensagens em massa.
short.zh_CN: 使用 WhatsApp 批量发送信息，与客户建立联系。
short.zh_TW: 使用 WhatsApp 大量發送訊息，與客戶建立聯繫

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
## Features
- Send personalized message, picture, video and document
- Send bulk WhatsApp message from excel
- Send to group members 1 by 1
- Save your own WhatsApp promotion message template
- Customizable sending interval
- Current sending progress
- Pause and resume at any time
- Export sending result list
- One-click retry failed

Try the safest wa sender, send bulk messages on WhatsApp and speed up your WhatsApp marketing now!

If you like WA Bulk Message Sender, show us more love with a nice review. It really helps.
